name: New Digital Noise
tag_list: digital-marketing, online-marketing-solutions, online-consulting, website-localisation, mobile-application-development, social-media-marketing, website-design, website-development, out-of-home, digital-out-of-home, interactive-installation
overview:
Founded in 2001, New Digital Noise is the leading pioneer in developing a brandâ€™s market presence with their creative application of the newest technologies on the market.

NDN helps guide the brand, leading it to the consumer via marketable portals in the digital world.

They pave the way between the client and the market by engaging marketing platforms to enhance brand recognition and following. NDN provides award-winning marketing solutions and service. They offer online marketing solutions, online consulting and website localisation. They specialise in mobile application development, social media marketing, website design and development, out-of-home advertising and interactive installations.

They are innovators. NDN’s team is made up of a collective of creative minds who strive to produce the very best.

offices.address1: 1802 Chinachem Exchange Square, 1 Hoi Wan Street, Quarry Bay
